attributes.action: Use Government power to re-instate the Football Home Internationals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the Home Internationals should be reinstated again. England, Wales, Northern Ireland, Republic of Ireland and Scotland should compete against each other.

For the sake of United Kingdom and Irish football we need governments intervention to the appropiate Football Associations.

rejection.details: Football is a self-governing sport in the UK.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
